## Summary

> Briefly describe the module changes, and the version tagging upgrade.
> For example, aws-s3.v0.0.1 to aws-s3.v1.0.0, initial S3 module with versioning configuration.

## Check list

- [ ] Has **terraform** been formatted and has the documentation been updated.
- [ ] Has the **CHANGELOG** been updated and versioning too.
- [ ] Has the **module** been tagged (after merging).
